alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Lumpkin; Murray; Pickens; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Cherokee, west central Lumpkin, Gilmer, northeastern Murray, western Dawson, east central Gordon, Pickens, southwestern Union, southern Fannin and northeastern Bartow Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 859 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cherry Log to Cartecay to near Waleska, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Ellijay, Blue Ridge, Ball Ground, Nelson, Waleska, East Ellijay, Morganton, Talking Rock, Amicalola Falls State Park, Sequoyah Lake, Jones Creek, Juno, Fausett Lake, Len Foote Hike Inn, Cartecay, Pisgah, Talmadge, Cherry Log, and Tate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
